meanings.definition: A caption or legend accompanying a photograph.
meanings.sent1: The cutline under the picture described what was happening.
meanings.sent2: The newspaper always includes a cutline to explain the images.
meanings.sent3: The cutline made the photo even more interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a cutline, adding depth to the image.
meanings.sent5: The cutline was so detailed, it felt like a story on its own.

meanings.definition: A line indicating where something should be cut.
meanings.sent1: The pattern had a cutline to show where to trim the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The cutline on the paper template helped with precise cutting.
meanings.sent3: I followed the cutline carefully to avoid mistakes.
meanings.sent4: The cutline was like a guide for the perfect cut.
meanings.sent5: Her scissors glided along the cutline smoothly.

meanings.definition: A line or lines of text printed below an illustration or photograph.
meanings.sent1: The artist always includes a cutline to explain the artwork.
meanings.sent2: The cutline provided additional information about the painting.
meanings.sent3: The cutline added a touch of humor to the serious image.
meanings.sent4: Her words below the picture were like a cutline, enhancing the meaning.
meanings.sent5: The cutline was so clear, it drew attention to the details in the image.
